unnormalised: Yo, car lovers! The automotive scene is buzzing with fresh metal hitting Indian roads. Maruti Suzuki just dropped the new Brezza facelift, claiming it's "as spicy as a Chennai dosa" – bold claims, folks! Initial reviews say the mileage is decent, hovering around 25 kmpl.
normalised: Yo, car lovers! The automotive scene is buzzing with fresh metal hitting Indian roads. Maruti Suzuki just dropped the new Brezza facelift, claiming it's "as spicy as a Chennai dosa" – bold claims, folks! Initial reviews say the mileage is decent, hovering around twenty five kilometer per liter.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Tata Motors unveiled their much-awaited electric SUV, the 'Panchavati E'," at the Auto Expo near Delhi. Dr. Sharma from IIT-Madras gave it a thumbs-up for its battery tech. Pre-bookings are already overflowing!
normalised: Meanwhile, Tata Motors unveiled their much-awaited electric S U V, the 'Panchavati E'," at the Auto Expo near Delhi. Doctor Sharma from I I T-Madras gave it a thumbs-up for its battery tech. Pre-bookings are already overflowing!

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Mahindra is teasing a rugged off-roader, codenamed 'The Thar 2.0', promising to conquer any terrain "from Ladakh to Kanyakumari". Expect a price tag starting around Rs. 15 lakhs.
normalised: Not to be left behind, Mahindra is teasing a rugged off-roader, codenamed 'The Thar two point zero', promising to conquer any terrain "from Ladakh to Kanyakumari". Expect a price tag starting around rupees fifteen lakhs.

unnormalised: And hold up! A new homegrown electric scooter brand, "Spark EV," is entering the market with a fancy launch event in Bangalore featuring a 10,000 sq ft display area! Let's see if these new rides can handle our crazy Indian traffic! Stay tuned for more updates!
